Judul: The data of Escherichia coli strains genes in different types of wastewater
Abstrak:
From April 2016 to March 2017, a number of 99 isolates of
Escherichia coli were collected from three types of wastewater
including urban wastewater (33 isolates), livestock slaughterhouse
wastewater (33 isolates) and poultry slaughterhouse wastewater
(33 isolate). The specimens were cultured on microbiological
media. The bacterial identification was performed by morphological and biochemical tests. Polymerase chain reaction (PCR)
method was carried out to detect 2 virulence genes (traT, and
fimH) and 4 antibiotic resistance genes (bla TEM, CTX, SHV, and tetA).
The data showed that the prevalence rate of traT, fimH,blaCTX,
blaTEM,blaSHV, tetA genes were 89.9%, 91.9%, 79.8%, 40.4%, 6.1%,
and 91.9%, respectively.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Behnaz Naraghi.,Jalal Mardaneh.,Mojtaba Kianmehr., Hamed Biglari
Kata Kunci: Escherichia coli Wastewater Virulence genes Resistance genes Antibiotic resistance
